msg: Align server.xml installed by the Windows installer with the one bundled in zip/tar.gz files.

author: hansbak
msg: several enhancements on the product image management system including adding the proper permissions to the fulladmin security group to be able to approve images

author: kkolinko
msg: Fix NPE in CoyoteAdapter when postParseRequest() call fails.
That was caused by mappingData.context being null.
This NPE occurence in 7.0.7 was reported on the users list.
